original_text: Also to his son Shemaiah were sons born who were rulers in their fathers' houses, for they were men of great ability.
korean_text: 그의 아들 스마야도 두어 아들을 낳았으니 그들의 조상의 가문을 다스리는 자요 큰 용사라

sentences.original_text: Also to his son Shemaiah were sons born
who were rulers in their fathers' houses
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 아비들의 집에서 다스리는 자들이었다

sentences.original_text: for they were men of great ability.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 큰 능력을 가진 사람들이었기 때문이다
